definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: The wicking behavior of compact and ring spun yarns and knitted fabrics made from them is assessed.
sentences.chinese: 評價了集聚紡和環錠紡細紗及其織物的芯吸性能。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the industry cluster in Jining has reached certain extent .
sentences.chinese: 當前，濟寧市產業集聚已經有了一定的規模和基礎。

sentences.english: The town of Maierato is the cluster of buildings in the center of each image.
sentences.chinese: 集聚在圖片中心的一團建築物就是馬耶拉託城。

sentences.english: Coastal areas have geographical advantages of industrial development.
sentences.chinese: 沿海地區具有工業集聚的地理優勢。

sentences.english: The third part introduces the formation and development of rural industry agglomeration.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分介紹農村工業集聚區的形成與發展。

sentences.english: Soon, he was steered to the forest by other immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 很快，在其它移民的指導下，他來到了森林集聚地。

sentences.english: The development of modern service industry cluster districts(MSICD) twines together with the growing of the comprehensive transportation hub.
sentences.chinese: 現代服務業集聚區與綜合交通樞紐共生共榮。

sentences.english: The nature of industry agglomeration is the result of economy subject choosing each other.
sentences.chinese: 產業空間集聚的本質是經濟行爲主體相互選擇的結果。

sentences.english: Honey ants gather honey dew secreted by aphids.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜螞蟻集聚蚜蟲分泌的蜜露。

sentences.english: Floating population gather of outer suburban district is a new trend of population distribution and change in metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 遠郊區流動人口集聚是大城市人口分佈變動的新動向。

sentences.english: Some experiments have been done to validate the mechanical model, ther…
sentences.chinese: 結果表明所建立的集聚區內須條的力學模型是正確的。

sentences.english: At last, agglomeration development of industry produced a certain degree of crowding effect.
sentences.chinese: 工業的集聚發展產生了一定程度的擁擠效應。

sentences.english: Compactor was once used on traditional ring spinning machine, but failed to obtain ideal compacting effect.
sentences.chinese: 集合器曾被用於傳統環錠紡中，但集聚效果並不理想。

sentences.english: The project is planned to be set in Yexian Industrial Gathering Area.
sentences.chinese: 項目擬建設於葉縣產業集聚區。

sentences.english: Ningguo City District & Port Town will be the Urban Area.
sentences.chinese: 寧國市區和港口片區是未來城市集聚發展區。

sentences.english: My next care was to get together the wrecks of my fortune.
sentences.chinese: 第二件我所關心的事就是集聚破產後的餘財。

definition: to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
place of origin/source (of a war or a social movement)
creative industries (design, music, publishing etc)/abbr. for 文化創意產業|文化创意产业
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
